Job Title: Java, SQL/NoSQL with Docker/Kubernetes.. Software Developer/Architect
Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities You shall work for a European Start up in Human Resources Space. The team is distributed in Europe, Africa, USA and in India. The India team shall have 50 software developers eventually. It is WFH, and the office is in NoidaDesired Candidate Profile You have 7+ years of software development experience in commercial or enterprise applications.You have 4+ years of full-time experience as a Java developer on Linux platform and familiar with Test frameworks (JUnit, Mockito etc.).You hold a bachelor or above degree in computer science or related fields.You are familiar with the latest Java development framework and open-source tools.You have a strong understanding of web application architectures and experience in SaaS Product Development dealing with large volumes of data.You have a deep SQL / NoSQL database knowledge (MySQL, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, etc.) and deep understanding of container technology (Docker, Kubernetes, etc.)You have excellent skills in communication (written and verbal) and collaboration with other functional teams (Support Engineering, Tools, Product, etc.).Should be ready to join within 30 daysPerks and Benefits Rs 15 - 30 la per annum
